alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS DEVELOPING OVER NORTHEASTERN WISCONSIN... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a scattered thunderstorms developing across Forest through Marinette County, moving southwest at 15 mph. A few of these storms have been reported to produce half inch hail in the Norway area of the Upper Peninsula. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Forest, southeastern Vilas, Florence, Marinette and north central Oconto Counties, including the following locations... Luna-White Deer Campground, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, Middle Inlet, Bastile Lake Natural Area, Anvil Lake Campground, Blackwell, Beecher, Silver Cliff, High Falls Reservoir and Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Vilas
